story: Jane hated eating fish on Sundays.
It was a family tradition.
She begged her parents to change it.
They decided to improvise for her sake.
Jane is now allowed to eat spaghetti on Sundays.
Tom moved into a new apartment.
He noticed the walls were bare.
He wanted to decorate.
He bought posters.
He decorated his apartment with the posters.
John was playing poker with his buddies.
The pot was up to two hundred dollars.
John had two kings in his hand.
John took an additional card - a king!
John went all in, making all the other players fold.
Kevin was excited when he was offered a job by the gym downtown.
It was far from his house, though, and he didn't have a car.
Kevin went to the attic and dusted off his old ten-speed bike.
It would be a long trip every day, but Kevin knew it was worth it.
He took the job, started getting in shape and saving money for a car.
Janet has always been very ticklish.
She avoids telling people because she can't control her reaction.
Janet's husband came up behind her and began to tickle her sides.
Janet flinched and ended up accidentally elbowing him in the eye.
Janet's husband no longer tickles her.
Lars was watching this really artsy movie.
Outside of the theater, he met this girl wearing a beret.
He asked her what she thought about the movie.
She spouted a bunch of artsy smartsy gibberish.
Lars knew he had found the love of his life.
Ashley was smoking a cigarette in her bedroom.
Suddenly, a bunch of ash fell onto the floor.
Her carpets were white and she was worried there'd be a stain.
She quickly grabbed some carpet cleaner.
Luckily, she was able to get the ash away with a spray.
Alicia was feeling stressed.
She needed to do some yoga.
She went to her first lesson.
But problem was she couldn't do the poses.
So she had to do another sport instead.
Yesterday I went to a party.
I wore my pretty white dress to it.
Unfortunately I spilled wine on it.
The stain would not come out.
The dress was ruined.
Peyton is from Omaha.
He loves to tell everyone that's where he's from.
One day he yells Omaha on television.
Suddenly everyone knows about Omaha.
Mutual of Omaha is very excited about the free advertising.
Wade decided to visit Peru during his time off.
He took a plane and then went directly to Machu Picchu.
He stayed there a whole week and fell in love with the place.
He was so moved by his spiritual experience, he decided to stay.
He wrote back home, resigned from work, and was very content.
Jack's dog is jumping around.
Jack decides to walk his dog.
Jack walks around the block with his dog.
Jack brings his dog home.
Jack takes the leash off his dog.
Becs sat down to start her novel on Sunday morning.
For the first 2 hours, everything went completely smoothly.
Then, at around 10AM, she ran into writer's block.
She put music on, and was inspired by the lyrics.
For the next 6 hours, she wrote without stopping.
A friend of mine gave me a small jade plant five years ago.
Since then I have fell in love with succulents.
I visited a local nursery and bought five other different kinds.
I take care of them and water them at least once a month.
I am proud of my succulent collection.
My Aunt bought a special shower head that filters water.
It was supposed to keep her colored hair from turning funny colors.
I would never tell my Aunt, but I think she chooses the funny colors.
I guess when I get older I will try to hide my gray hair too.
However, I'm not so sure filtered water will help.
Janet was hungry for lunch.
She had lots of coupons.
She didn't know which place was the best offer.
Eventually she finally decided.
But by then her lunch hour was over.
Austin and Ally were planning their wedding.
They were overwhelmed with all that had to go into it.
After talking it over, they decided to invite a handful of people.
They are planning on a small destination wedding.
All that matters to them is being married.
Cathy was trying to take care of her toddler.
She had given him a plate of food but he wouldn't take a single bite.
She tried to get him to take a bite but he refused.
Nothing she offered was interesting to him.
She decided to give up but luckily he ate shortly after.
Tina wants to go to her prom tonight.
She takes her pink dress out of the closet and sees a big tear.
She panics so much, she starts crying.
Her mom comes to comfort her and repairs the tear.
Tina feels foolish and goes to the prom with a nice dress.
George wanted to take his family to his mother's for the holidays.
It was unfortunate that a snowstorm closed all travel though.
George decided to make the best of the situation.
He pulled out some board games to play with the kids.
The family enjoyed the holidays with each other.
A man wanted to build a pool with a very deep, deep end.
He rented some heavy digging tools to make his pool.
The man dug for hours until it was deep enough.
He lined the pool and filled it with water.
The pool was so deep he couldn't see the bottom.
Frank liked to make lists.
He bought a new notebook just for it.
He wrote his grocery list and his to-do list.
He loved the way the new notebook opened and closed.
It kept him organized.
Maria wanted to make ice cream without an ice cream machine.
She first tried freezing the ice cream mixture without churning.
However, that just turned out as a solid block of milky ice.
Then, when her back was turned, her dog stole it!
At least someone got to enjoy it, she thought.
Mike went to the doctor with his mom and baby sister.
His baby sister was getting her one year shots.
Mike got so sad when his sister cried, he asked to step outside.
He was surprised to hear no cryin!
His baby sister did a great job with her shots!
I was raking leaves in my front yard.
I made several huge piles.
My son came running out of the house.
He stage-dove into one of the piles.
I made him finish raking the yard.
Peter went to bed really early last night.
He was really glad to have that happen.
He got to wake up early this morning.
He got up so early that he was able to get all his work done at noon.
Now Peter has the rest of the day off.
Kia saw a dog running across a lawn towards her.
She was terrified and knew the dog would attack her!
But then it stopped short at the edge of the lawn.
Kia realized that the yard had an underground fence.
She was very relieved!
I backed up to an exaggerated distance.
I said that she was always giving me a hard time.
My friend told me that I was too close to a woman.
She said that the woman was married.
This was at a wedding.
Lana was friends with Rick and Jeb in high school.
Rick and Jeb were considered wild boys.
One day they left the school at lunchtime in Jeb's car.
Jeb and Rick were involved in a serious car crash.
Lana was upset when she heard Jeb and Rick were hurt.
Howard had a job interview.
He was very nervous.
He went into the office and gave a bad handshake.
It all went downhill from there.
He knew he did not get the job.
Ashley commutes to work everyday.
She loves to listen to music during the drive.
Her sister made her a playlist just for her commute.
This playlist has some of her favorite songs.
Now she drives happily singing along.
Jonas always desired to go to the races.
He got tickets for his birthday.
His father took him and his best friend.
They all had a great time together.
Jonas' favorite racer won the race too!
Ryan was having trouble living with his father.
His father constantly yelled at him for seemingly no reason.
Ryan decided on working more hours to save up to move out.
He eventually saved enough to move out with 3 friends of his.
Ryan has been enjoying life much more without his father.
Lily was wearing a beautiful white dress to the dance.
Someone accidentally spilled red punch on it.
She didn't have any way to get home so she stayed.
People thought the dress was white with a red pattern.
She had a number of people compliment her on it.
John wanted to take his wife out for a special evening.
He picked her up at work and took her for a drink.
He then took her to a nice restaurant that served her favorite food.
She was so happy, she wanted to do the same for him.
And at the next opportunity, she bought football tickets for him.
Chris was a very healthy eater.
He would cook boiled eggs everyday.
One day he forgot he was cooking.
When he returned to the kitchen the water had evaporated.
Chris was upset he ruined his eggs.
Larson liked to collect antiques.
One interesting thing he'd found was an old can of corn.
It had very old graphics and funny words.
He displayed it on a shelf in his kitchen.
Larson decided he would collect more in the future.
When I was bartending, two of my favorite actors came into my work.
They stayed all night.
I took a ton of pictures with them.
Three days later I lost my phone.
I've never seen any of the pictures I took with the actors.

663772de-de72-4416-a698-100bb9ace5aa.storytitle: Robber Gets What's Comin to Him
story: There had been a string of robberies in the town.
Mark was worried for his family because he worked overnight.
He instructed his daughter to lock up when he left in the evening.
He got a call from the police around midnight.
His daughter had captured a burglar, locking him in the garden shed.
My sister recently helped me score a sweet deal on Facebook.
At first I thought it was too good to be true but it all worked out.
All I have to do is comment on twenty posts within a Facebook page.
It's a page that posts coupons and other deals online for free.
In return, they send me a $50 e-gift card every Friday!
Nelly was having a cookout with her friends.
She wanted to make a s'more that would impress everyone.
Things were coming along nicely until her marshmallow combusted.
She was forced to serve up the burnt marshmallow.
To her surprise, her friends loved the treat.
Fred bought a new bicycle.
But he decided to settle on a cheap bike lock.
Within a week, Fred's bike was stolen.
And he bought a much better bike lock the next time.
Fred learned his lesson.
Ben got hurt last night playing football.
His mom said he could not walk this morning.
She had to take him to the hospital.
The doctor did some x-rays and tests.
They told Ben that he fractured his leg.
Today I played only two games on online chess.
I played two speed games with my friend Harry.
I won the first and lost the second.
Harry had errands and could not play.
I continued to play strangers online.
Elise noticed something creepy.
A bunch of birds were hanging out on the telephone wire.
They were staring at her house.
She walked away from the window and tried to ignore them.
The birds flew down and landed in her front yard.
Amy and her dad were driving out of state.
Amy kept sleeping when her dad awoke her at a gas station
Later she awoke and needed to use the restroom.
Her dad was upset because she didn't go when the stopped for gas.
They sat in angry silence for an hour after the second stop.
Cleo couldn't read, but she wanted to learn.
Each week she went to a book club and listened to others read.
At home, she secretly practiced reading aloud.
She grew better and better.
And finally one week, she read a whole story aloud to her club!
Joe really hated to clean his house.
He decided to order a Roomba cleaning robot online.
The Roomba arrived in the mail in a week.
Joe no longer had to clean his floors anymore.
He programmed his Roomba to clean every spot in his house.
Tina ordered a sub.
It was fast food.
But it was taking too long.
Tina then got angry.
So she complained to management.
Sean and Sara had an argument.
They disagreed about who should clean the kitchen.
They didn't speak the whole day.
Eventually, the argued again.
This time they resolved the disagreement.
Amy's loved cartoons.
Her favorite was The Yogi Bear show.
She and her sister would sit and watch it for hours.
One day she told her mother how much she loved the show.
Her mother told her this was a show she watched in her own childhood.
The couple planned an anniversary trip.
They went to Vegas and ate and drank a lot.
They went to casinos and dressed up.
It was a fun trip.
They couldn't wait to do it again!
Martha liked to spend a lot of time at the lake.
She was careless about using sunscreen when she was at the lake.
Over the years Martha suffered several severe sunburns.
Martha ended up getting skin cancer because of her time at the lake.
Martha now avoids the sun by staying indoors.
Jan was driving when a lens popped out of her eyeglasses.
Suddenly the road before her looked alarmingly blurry.
She slowed down and carefully pulled out of traffic.
Feeling around on the floor, she was fortunate to find the lens.
She carefully popped it back in and was able to get home safely.
Mel had a bowling competition this weekend.
He decided to work on his strength to prepare.
Mel spent every day at the gym for a month.
He also spent the weekends practicing at his local bowling alley.
Mel was able to place first in the competition!
The boy picked his nose.
His mom made him stop.
The boy did it in private the next time.
His mom did not make him stop that time.
He started picking his nose in private all the time.
Wilfred wanted to throw a BBQ for all of his friends and neighbors.
He went to the store to buy the meat.
Two of his friends helped with the preparations.
On the day of the barbecue everything was going well until it rained.
The barbecue continued inside the house and everyone had fun.
Sue had a bad habit.
She chewed her nails.
She could not stop.
He dad said to picture all the germs that went into her mouth.
Once she did that she never chewed her nails again.
Todd was walking to the grocery store.
He needed to cross a crosswalk first.
Everything was going fine until he was almost across.
Suddenly a car came speeding through the lane almost hitting him.
Todd yelled at the driver but they didn't stop and he had to move on.
Brenda wanted to learn how to speak French.
So she decided to take a French class.
She became fluent in French.
But she had no one to speak French with.
Brenda regret learning French.
Mist was very interested in ancient ruins.
Her parents took her to a nearby museum complex.
The museum had some actual ruins that had been excavated.
Mist loved her time at the museum a great deal.
She resolved then and there to get into archaeology.
Gale and Kim were bored.
They decided to go shopping at the mall.
They mostly looked and bought a few items.
Eventually they got tired and decided to leave.
Neither regretted what they bought but neither would buy it again.
There is a computer with a virus on it at the office.
Nobody knows how to fix it.
Michael the office computer is called in.
He fixes the problem in no time.
The computer is virus free after Michael's visit.
Tommy and Bill were roommates.
Tommy had planned on going to the store.
Tommy asked Bill if he needed anything from the store.
Bill replied he needed oranges.
Tommy brought home oranges from the store.
Tom went to the zoo to see the elephants.
He had a peanut in his pocket.
He'd always heard elephants loved peanuts.
He threw it to the elephant.
He ate it!
Tim is a cook at a fast food place.
He daydreams about being rich.
He wants to start his own business one day.
One day his boss asks him to come into the office.
His boss offered him the chance to help run the store.
Billy had to write an essay for his class tomorrow.
He wrote the majority of it last week so he was not worried.
When he began to finish up his essay his computer started sputtering.
The screen turned blue and would not function.
He emailed his teacher about an extension for his assignment.
Jane's had a house in a city.
The yard had no grass.
She hired some men to come fix everything.
She planted sunflowers and grass.
Now she has a beautiful yard.
Gwen's mom laid her down in her crib for a nap.
Gwen cried and whined and did not want to go to sleep.
When her mom came to check on her she was not in her crib.
Gwen's mom looked everywhere for her.
She found Gwen playing with toys in her closet.
Sam was grabbing a slice of pizza at his favorite pizzeria.
When he went back to his car he found a parking ticket.
The parking ticket was for $10.
Sam forgot to pay the ticket.
He was fined an additional $10 for paying late.
Alicia went for her first driving lesson.
She was scared.
When she started driving, she drove into the cones.
Alicia thought she would never be a good driver.
Thankfully though, she passed the test.
The man took the top off his convertible.
It started to rain.
He tried to put the top back on.
He couldn't get it to fit.
He had to cover the car with a tarp.
Susan went to see a comedy show.
She was skeptical.
It ended up being very funny.
Susan thought it was the funniest thing.
She wanted to see more of the shows.
Kate and some friends were driving to Las Vegas.
They had been driving for 5 hours.
And had already argued about the frequent stops.
Now they weren't talking to each other.
They drove down the highway in an awkward, uncomfortable silence.
Nathan got a promotion.
He was going to be the general manager of the dealership.
He worked hard every day.
He wanted to make his dealership very successful.
After a year, sales had increased 30%!
Dotty was alarmed to see the red circle on her chest.
She was only a mild mannered banker.
The man behind the laser sight had mistaken her for someone else.
He fired a single shot where the laser had landed.
Dotty's blood took the bank's janitor days to fully clean up.
Walter noticed something strange in the sky one night.
He didn't believe in space aliens, but he was confused.
He was sure he had seen a flying saucer in the night sky.
Then he saw on the news that a weather balloon had crashed.
Walter was relieved that aliens hadn't come visiting after all.
I woke up one rainy night to a loud thud.
I walked outside my room and then I heard it again.
I began to look for the source of the noise but couldn't find it.
Then I heard the noise suddenly and saw a tree branch hit my window.
After realizing what made the noise, I went back to bed.
Jimmy was tired.
Jimmy decided he should change his diet.
He stopped eating candy.
He felt even more tired.
His doctor told him he was diabetic.
Rita is out at burger king with her family.
She is enjoying her usual meal.
While eating she gets something in her throat.
Rita is choking and needs help.
A burger king employee comes and saves Rita from choking.
Philo wanted a family crest as a tattoo.
Philo ordered his name's proper crest researched.
The researchers sent him a heraldic crest.
Philo got the tattoo.
The researchers called to apologize, for they had sent the wrong one.
Mark wanted to buy a horse.
He didn't know anything about them.
He called a farmer and told him what he was looking for.
The next day, the farmer dropped an animal off and collected $3000.
Mark was too stupid to realize it was a donkey instead.
Leslie had to fire an employee and she was nervous.
She was a new manager and never fired anyone before.
She reached out to a peer and asked for advice and tips.
She used the given advice and called in the employee.
She was able to fire the employee with ease and she felt good after.
Little Jimmy wanted to be the class president.
He made fliers and passed them out at school.
He talked to everyone he could and encouraged them to vote for him.
On election day, the votes were close.
Jimmy won the presidency by seven votes.
Cindy found a cute puppy advertised on facebook.
She wanted the puppy so bad.
Her husband decided to surprise her.
He brought the puppy home to her.
Cindy was so happy.
Mick wanted to paint some furniture.
He found an antique dresser.
He carefully sanded and painted it.
It was a beautiful shade of gray.
Mick loved how the project turned out.
Rex hasn't left his tiny apartment all day.
Finally he decides to meet a friend for coffee.
They each have a coffee at the local coffee shop.
As Rex walks home, he realizes that the coffee will keep him awake.
Still he is glad that he left his apartment to see a friend.
Todd wanted to do things only in a natural manner.
He cut off all of his electronic devices and threw out many things.
He started trying to live naturally.
He found that at every turn he encountered unnatural modernity.
Todd gave up his goal and embraced the modern era.
Transcribing seemed like an easy way to make money.
Turns out I was wrong!
I first attempted transcribing audio clips on mturk.
The first one I did took me over 3 hours for an hour audio.
I decided the pay wasn't worth it, and went to other things.
We went to the local graveyard.
It is several hundred years old.
We looked at the old graves.
People dressed as zombies told the tales of the dead.
We were enthralled by the stories, and really enjoyed the visit.
Molly purchased tomato seeds for herself.
She bought green pepper seeds for her sister.
She raised the seeds to seedlings before transplanting.
Unfortunately she had gotten the seeds mixed up.
She had peppers and her sister had tomatoes.
Roger is a basketball player for his community.
He is currently in a close game.
His team is down by 1 point with 10 seconds left.
The ball is passed inbound to Roger.
Roger takes the shot and swish it goes in!
Gina's brother Jay had an attitude issue.
He promised to work to improve it.
But he was the same rude person to Gina.
In some ways his attitude was worse.
Gina barely spoke to him, and avoided him as much as possible.
Martha was cooking a stew.
She wanted to make it extra special.
She put a special seasoning she had made in it.
Everyone ate the dinner and loved it.
15 minutes after eating everyone fell asleep.
Sally is in a relationship with her dream guy.
She feels so lucky to be with such a handsome guy.
One night while on a date he sits down and talks to her.
He tells her that he just isn't feeling a connection with her.
Sally gets dumped by her dream guy.
Tim was being fed some baby food.
He was extra fussy today.
Tim grabbed it and threw it all over the place.
It was all too messed up to try and feed him.
Tim was given a bottle instead.
David went on a tour to see the countryside.
The bus broke down.
David was saddened.
Due to time constraint, he either can go home or keep touring.
David chose to go home.
A man walked up behind me on the trail.
He was wearing a Freddy Krueger costume.
Even the sweater was very realistic.
I tried hard not to run.
I told him to get away from me, and he laughed.
Todd took his dog to the beach.
The dog ran around and smelled everything.
The dog went in the water and got all wet
The dog rolled in the sand and got all sandy.
On the drive home, the dog got sand all over the car.
Jennifer went to the beach with friends.
The sun was out and the beach was busy.
Jennifer went into the ocean and went swimming.
She got out of the water and dried off with a towel.
Jennifer then got in the car with her friends and went home.
I use to work overnight freight at a local store.
I got hurt on the job and had to take a month of light duty.
When I returned to full duty, the manager started scheduling me less.
I talked to others in the company about it, but nothing came of it.
I ended up walking out one night at lunch and never looking back.
Cindy was riding her bicycle.
But she wasn't wearing a helmet.
While riding across the street, a car almost hit her.
And Cindy felt unsafe without a helmet from then on.
So she bought a nice helmet and wore it on every bike ride.
Gerry went to the doctor complaining of headaches.
He had an x-ray.
The doctor found a brain tumor.
The doctor operated on the tumor.
Gerry died during the operation on the tumor.
The outdoorsmen were hiking in the woods.
They saw a moose walking in the distance.
The moose stumbled into the woods again.
The men tried to follow it but it got away.
It had been an amazing sight!
My dad and I flew to Canada.
We landed in Edmonton, Alberta.
We went to the world largest mall there.
They even had an indoor waterpark.
We had a great day.
Amy wanted a new doll for Christmas.
She showed her mother a picture of the doll she wanted.
He mother told her if she was good Santa would bring her the doll.
Amy was on her best behavior waiting for Christmas.
Amy was so happy when she opened the gift containing the doll!
Tina made some coffee yesterday.
She was about to drink the cup.
Then she realized it was too strong.
She couldn't drink it after all.
She had to add some creamer first.
Tom got a kitten.
It ran away within days.
Tom never found it.
He got another cat.
By the time Tom's kitten returned he had forgotten about it.
Marco likes to drive trucks.
He got a job being a truck driver.
He drives all over the United States hauling cement.
He became very good at this and started his own business.
Marco is now the boss and has a successful truck driving business.
James was woken up around 3am by a sound in his garage.
He lives in the wilderness so he was afraid it was a bear.
He got up to look out of his window and sure enough, it was.
The bear had managed to lift his garage door.
James closed the door and trapped the bear inside until rangers came.
Walden dug a hole in the ground.
He put a plastic bag in the hole.
He filled the hole with water.
He sat in the hole.
He called the hole a pool.
Steve had an exam coming up soon.
A lot of his friends were in that class as well so they studied.
After studying they'd hang out for a bit and relax.
On the day of the exam they all met up and studied one more time.
All of them passed and had very good grades on the exam!
Anthony had a sore tooth.
He went to the dentist.
The dentist took an X-ray of the tooth.
The dentist filled the cavity in the tooth.
Anthony felt better after the dentist appointment.
Zach wanted to become a singer in the church choir.
He knew his singing voice wasn't great.
He practiced singing in front of his mirror.
Zach repeated this process every night for a month.
Zach finally joined the church choir.
Ryan and his mom went to the zoo on a field trip.
Ryan was most excited about riding the zoo train.
When they arrived at the zoo, they bought tickets for the train.
On the train ride, Ryan was able to see many zoo animals.
It was a successful trip.
Ethan had cucumbers growing in his garden.
He decided to make pickles with them.
He chopped them and soaked them in vinegar.
He added a few herbs, too.
The pickles were delicious!
Mark deposited his paycheck early last week.
He went to use his debit card and it was denied for no funds.
He called his bank immediately to see what had happened.
It was found to be that the teller deposited to another account.
They smoothed it out and he got his money put into his account.
Today I ordered a new silver coin.
I am excited because it is the first coin in my collection.
The coin should be here any day.
The coin was minted the year my son was born.
I intend to pass on this coin to my son.
Gus looked at the chess board with great interest.
He moved his hand for a pawn but took it back.
His opponent tilted his head with interest.
Gus thought more and went to grab his knight.
The opponent gasped with this turn of events.
I was walking down the hall and I stubbed my toe.
It was bleeding all over the place.
I wrapped it up and held it tight.
I put an ice pack on to dull the pain.
It stopped hurting about an hour later.
I bought budget hosting for my new website.
It was from one of the big hosting companies.
The service was spotty and the customer service was terrible.
I switched to a smaller provider.
I had no issues and was very pleased with my decision to switch.
Bridgett got an letter for Jury Duty.
She threw it always like she always did.
Three months later she got another letter.
It was a letter to appear in court for missing jury duty.
It seems Bridgett would now have a jury deciding her fate.
The farmer woke up at 3AM.
He got dressed and ate a small breakfast.
After breakfast, he immediately started to work on his farm.
He collected eggs and milked the cows.
The farmer ended his day by sipping on some ice tea.
One afternoon, I was rollerblading on a sidewalk in my neighborhood.
The sidewalk became steeply slanted and I began to speed up.
The pace proved too much and I lost control.
I veered off the sidewalk and onto a grassy hill and fell.
The fall sent me into a canal and since then I haven't rollerbladed.
Jane likes to dance.
Jane's husband doesn't know how to dance.
Jane tries to teach him but he doesn't seem to be getting better.
Secretly Jane's husband goes to a professional for training.
Jane is surprised when her husband is dancing better than she is.
Today I threw a rock at a bird.
I missed the bird entirely.
I accidentally hit my dad's window and it broke.
My dad is going to be mad when he gets home.
I hope my dad does not ground me for breaking the window.
Evan was being rushed to the hospital.
He had had a seizure.
His mother was terrified.
The doctors said he would be ok.
She was relieved but still on edge.
Fred was a crewman on a nascar team.
He was the jack man.
Fred was very fast.
The car came in and he was off like a shot.
The crew did their fastest pit stop ever.
Tim tried a new hair style.
He really liked it.
Unfortunately nobody else did.
Everyone made fun of him.
Eventually Tim caved and changed his cut.
Louisa was at school.
She was eating lunch with friends.
Everyone had very healthy food.
Louisa pulled out her donut snack.
Everyone made fun of her for her unhealthy food.
Rosa was very upset that she didn't know how to cook.
Her single mother worked all the time and hadn't taught her how.
Rosa decided to ask her friend Alyssa's mom to teach her.
Alyssa's mom was happy to help and they began lessons right away.
Rosa's mom was really surprised when she came home and dinner was made!
Dan came into contact with a rehab therapist.
The therapist showed him several exercises to build body strength.
Since Dan was really skinny, exercising was hard.
For the past two month, he remained persistent.
He ended up with several muscles.
Joe and Andrew had an argument about who can eat the most wings.
To settle the debate they ordered wings from pizza hut.
They made a bet, loser pays the winner fifty dollars.
The competition was close but Andrew won.
Joe paid Andrew fifty dollars.
Stephanie has been gearing up for a dance recital on this Saturday!
She's been practicing for weeks on end
Her training has includes lots of multiple steps.
She's improved on her techniques and skills every day.
Today she gets to show everyone what she's learned and she's excited!
Phil wanted to run a marathon.
Phil tried to run to prepare for the race.
Phil was really struggling with motivation.
Another racer asked Phil to train with him.
Phil was able to prepare for the race and finished the marathon.
Dorothy wondered how she was going to pay for Christmas gifts.
She lived check to check.
There wasn't a lot left over.
She told her employer about her concerns.
He surprised her with a Christmas bonus!
My family went to a restaurant on the Ohio river.
It was a five course meal.
People tore off pieces of bread.
I had salmon and asparagus.
It was the best food I ever had.
We went camping on time when I was younger.
They had this pond you could swim in.
A day or two later everyone was sick.
I think the water that was feeding it was contaminated.
We made sure to not go back there again.
My son went shopping for his niece's birthday.
She is turning two.
Her parents like learning toys.
He bought her a big play map of the world.
The parents will try to teach her to recognize countries.
Susan was forced to go to dance recital.
She hated to dance.
So she planned to get out of it.
She started crying loudly in practice.
The teacher's had no choice but to take her out.
Emily loved software engineering.
Emily spent a lot of time learning how to do it.
After lots of practice she became quite good.
She applied for a job as a software engineer.
Now she owns her own software engineering company.
Robert was trying to help his friend with his car troubles.
They diagnosed the issue and looked online for a fix!
Unfortunately they couldn't find anything.
Robert asked his neighbor for some help and he accepted.
His neighbor was able to fix the car and solve his friend's issue.
Larry tells his wife he will be away on a business trip.
Larry really heads to a hotel room.
Larry is spending the night with another woman.
Larry gets a phone call from his wife.
His wife tells him she is outside and asks for a divorce.
Gina didn't want to step in knee deep snow to clean her car off.
She decided to pull the car away from the curb.
She checked to ensure no cars were around.
She parked in the street and exited her car.
She was happy to be able to avoid the deep snow.
Sara always struggled with math class.
One day she got back a test with a big F on it.
Sara was ashamed and vowed that her next grade would be an A.
Sara studied hard and asked for extra help studying.
Sara got back her next to with a big A on it.
Barney went on his first hunting trip.
His friends helped him find a good spot to hunt.
He still was unable to catch anything.
On the way home his friend spotted a deer.
Barney was able to make his first kill on the side of the road.
Formula 1 was Tanya's favourite thing to watch.
She supported Lewis Hamilton.
For her last birthday, she went to Silverstone and got VIP tickets.
She tried to get an autograph before the race, but couldn't get close.
After the race, he stopped and even gave her a hug.
It was finals week.
All of the college students were stressed.
Tom has a prescription for ritalin.
He started selling some.
He made a lot of money.
George signed up for an online course.
A lifelong learner, he was very excited to join in.
He listened to the introduction video, and felt his heart sink.
The teacher wanted everyone to film themselves as part of the class.
George, unable to overcome his social aversion, sadly withdrew.
My chorus teacher gave me the shirt.
We had to have a certain short for choir.
My orthodontist's son had the shirt.
I called and left her a message.
Her son brought it to my school.
In Jeff's neighborhood there lived a nasty, old, Siamese cat.
This nasty cat walked all around the neighborhood peeing on everything
One day, Jeff left his front door open and the nasty cat came inside.
The nasty cat went into every room and peed on everything.
When Jeff found out, he kicked the nasty cat.
Eli didn't know much about using Microsoft Access.
He needed to update a column to change a value.
Eli googled the procedure.
He found a tutorial and it was very simple.
Eli easily updated the column's values.
Sam woke up for school and got dressed.
He grabbed his jeans like any other day.
When he got to school everyone laughed.
He wasn't sure what they were laughing at.
He looked in the mirror and saw he was wearing the wrong jeans.
Carol was on a very big hike.
The hike took over three days.
One day, she stumbled over an anteater.
The anteater was harmless and Carol adored it.
Now, the anteater is able to eat whatever it wants.
Our neighbor Julia invited us to attend a concert.
Her husband is a music teacher at the Boston Conservatory.
The orchestra played Baroque music.
They performed two Bach cantatas.
We thoroughly enjoyed the performance.
Todd wanted a pet fish.
He told his mom he wanted a fish.
His mom told him he had to wait.
It was Todd's birthday.
His mom got him a big fish.
Mary was having a great day.
Suddenly she got a call delivering some awful news.
Her dog had been hit by a car.
She rushed home to deal with the news.
By the end of the day she felt completely wiped out.
Amy had a crush on a guy in her class.
She found out his name was Ray and he was new in town.
Since the teacher was talking the couldn't speak anymore.
After class he left before she could say anything else to him.
Amy watched in a daze as Ray walked down the hall.
Tammy lost her wedding ring.
She freaked out all day looking for it.
Her husband helped her look.
Finally they checked the garbage disposal.
It had fallen there when she washed dishes.
Emma wanted a dog but her husband didn't.
He said Emma could foster a dog temporarily.
She happily brought one home.
Soon they both began to love it.
Her husband decided they could keep the dog after all!
Mike dropped out of college after taking out student loans.
He quickly began to look for a job to cover his costs of living.
Mike found a job but struggled because of his debt.
Mike began to panic and started to suffer from depression.
Mike did not know what to do, so he quit his job out of frustration.
Our condo recently changed laundry machines.
The old ones took coins.
The new ones required a card and internet access.
Some of the older condo owners complained.
The board stayed by their decision, and everyone coped with the change.
Tom's favorite month was February.
His birthday was in February.
Tom thought that nothing would ever change that.
Then he had to renew his car tag every February for eighty dollars.
February was no longer his favorite month.
Jessica and Ted were proud parents of their young son.
One day their son brought home his first middle school report card.
Jessica was proud of her son.
She bought magnets to put the report card on the refrigerator.
She posted the report card there proudly.
The baby was rushed to NICU.
He had a low apgar due to prematurity.
He was tested several times.
The mother laid on her bed, worrying.
She knew something was wrong with her baby.
Jill's daughter had missed a lot of school.
Many of the absences were unexcused.
Jill had to meet with the truancy officer.
Jill was told she needed to send her child to school.
Jill's daughter began to go to school more regularly.
Tom had to take the bus to school.
One day the bus broke down.
Tom and the other kids were late.
Everyone got their tardy marks removed except Tom.
Tom felt singled out.
Chris wanted to try out for the school soccer team.
He was so excited he practiced everyday after school for hours.
He signed up for tryouts.
When he went to tryouts he did a great job.
Chris made the soccer team!
My sister in law was excited this week.
She found two complete sets of Time Life books in her attic.
I researched Amazon and said she could make $200.
When she weighed the books she found out they were too heavy.
She decided to donate the books to people who could pick them up.
Mort wanted to be a boxer when he grew up.
He asked his parents to sign him up for lessons.
They encouraged him to take karate instead.
They reasoned it was less likely to injure him.
Mort accepted the offer and slowly forgot about his boxing dreams.
Anita loved cooking in her new Wok.
She thought it would save her marriage, not ruin it.
One evening she dumped noodles and chicken in her Work.
But she never came back to prepare the meals.
Her husband wanted a divorce since she didn't prepare the meals.
Camille loved flowers.
Her husband planted her a beautiful rose garden.
She tended to it each day.
One day some mean kids ran over her flowers.
She was heartbroken.
Today I went to lunch.
It was rather good.
I had the gumbo.
I was surprised it was good.
I wanted to have it again.
Jessica has an English Exam in the morning.
She has been studying for weeks.
She knew she was going to do well.
When she got to class she got ready.
Then the teacher postponed the exam and Jessica was furious.
Jane was at a grocery store.
And she wanted to buy milk.
But she noticed that almond milk was on sale.
Jane decided to try it.
And only bought almond milk from then on.
Bill had to print out a report for his boss by noon.
He went to the printer and it was out of black ink.
Bill edited his document so that his report was in blue ink.
Bill sent the new document to the printer.
Bill's boss was glad that Bill was able to do his work on time.
Leah needed new vitamins.
She just didn't like the taste of them.
Yet she found out about gummy vitamins.
She tried some.
She ended up loving it.
I saw some soldiers at the airport the other day.
They were dressed in their uniforms.
When they got off the plane their families were there.
They were so happy to see the soldiers back home.
It was very touching.
In 1994 we went to Mystic for a family vacation.
We visited the Mystic Seaport.
We took a bus to Foxwoods and gambled.
We ended up swimming in New London, CT.
It was a fun vacation.
One Fourth of July, two boys were shooting firecrackers.
They put the firecrackers on a bench to shoot them into the air.
When the firecracker went into the air, it knocked over the bench.
When the bench fell, it made the firecracker go towards the boys!
After that, they never put firecrackers on a bench again.
Laura sat down and turned on her favorite television show.
Laura's younger brother entered the living room.
He sat down next to Laura, demanding that she play checkers with him.
Even though Laura refused, her brother continued asking her to play.
Upset, Laura stormed into her room and slammed the door.
My neighbor got a new bike.
I wanted to get a new bike too so we could ride together.
We went to the store to get a new bike.
I picked a blue mountain bike.
We went home and went on a long bike ride together.
Sue recently moved and has to start at a new school.
She is nervous and tells her parents that she doesn't want to go.
She tries to fake being sick but they still make her go.
Sue soon makes friends in the math club after school.
Sue then likes going to school to see her friends.
Maya really wanted this new job at a firm.
The firm told her she needed more experienced.
Maya got an another internship and worked very hard.
Finally the firm gave in and hired her.
Maya was thrilled.

2c9ef257-4649-4632-88d9-dbc7ee5a07b7.storytitle: To rap or not to rap
story: Jim thought he was good with rhyming.
His friends suggest he take up rapping.
Jim wrote a rap.
Everyone thought it crummy.
Jim decided never to take the advice of his friends.
Ben is taking his family on their first road trip.
He decided to drive them to Yosemite.
His two daughters were very excited at the start of the trip.
A few hours later, the two young girls got really bored.
They fell asleep for a few hours and woke up at Yosemite.
The teen went into the house by himself.
His friends had ran from it.
The teen went around the house.
The house creaked.
The house creaked cause it was old.
In 6th grade I had a boyfriend I liked very much.
I went out of town on a family vacation.
While I was gone, I bought him a nice souvenir with my own money.
When I got back, I found out he didn't like me any more.
I kept the souvenir for myself.
Steven and Sean were hanging out in the woods.
They were smoking when they heard dogs and voices.
Soon they realized a cop was searching the woods.
They gathered their things and bolted away.
They ran for a long time before finally stopping and feeling safe.
Andy was riding his bike around his neighborhood.
But then it started to rainy.
Instead of going inside, however, he continued to ride.
And he had fun riding through puddles.
When he got home, he was dripping with water.
I was nervous to start my new job.
I dressed my best and worried over my appearance.
When I arrived, I was surprised.
Everyone except me was dressed casually.
I only felt out of place for a day.
Tina was driving home from work one night.
It was snowing a lot.
She lost control and wound up in a ditch.
Nobody found the car until days later.
Tina's corpse was still inside of it.
Dwayne is chosen to be lead actor in a movie.
Dwayne arrives on set.
Dwayne films the movie for 3 months.
Dwayne helps edit the movie.
Dwayne goes home having finished the movie.
A man walked into a pet store and demanded to be sold the best pet.
The clerk offered him a snake and the man refused.
He told her snakes were the worst animal.
The clerk thought hard and suggested a falcon.
The man was overjoyed and bought a falcon right away.
The cat wandered into the room.
There was something weird.
There was a towel on the window.
The cat hopped up on the window.
The cat liked the towel.
I went to the bank to apply for a house loan.
I want to move out of my parents house.
The bank denied my application.
I didn't have any credit score.
Looks like I will be living with my parents for a little while.
Bob needed batteries for his flashlight.
He decided to use the batteries in his fire detector.
He decided to take a nap after putting the batteries in.
Unfortunately, the gas light in his attic ignited.
Without a fire detector, the house burned down and Bob burned with it.
Nettie was cleaning up her house.
She was carrying a huge stack of dishes.
Suddenly, the dishes slipped and spilled to the floor.
Some broke, but luckily her favorites were okay.
She cleaned up the mess and continued cleaning.
Each Halloween Nancy dresses as a witch.
This year, she wants to change and dress as a pirate.
But as she as no such costume, she has to buy one.
Her mother takes her to a costume shop.
And Nancy find the perfect costume with a black eye patch.
He slept uneasily.
The next day was the martial arts tournament.
His dreams were all about fighting.
He threw a kick in his sleep then awoke to the sound of a scream.
His girlfriend lay on the floor covered in bedsheets.
Donna's boyfriend was a type one diabetic.
This meant he couldn't have sugary desserts.
Once in a great while Donna would let him have cake.
He loved the special tiny slices of cake she made.
The cat also loved them and ate them every time.
Jenny pulled forcefully on the kitchen window shade.
It dangled limply in her hands, instead of rolling up as it should.
Jenny yanked it much harder than she had before.
The shade snapped loudly out of its holder.
Jenny has a big bruise on her forehead from where it smacked her.
A man went to a cat lot to test drive a car.
The salesman took him out in a station wagon.
The car ran out of gas a few miles from the lot.
The man saw that there was a leak in the gas tank.
He told the salesman he was not interested.
Norma loved climbing and had been focused on bouldering in particular.
Bouldering is a form of rock climbing without a harness.
The routes are short enough that with a padding one can drop down.
One day she sprained her ankle badly by landing the wrong way.
She was never able to trust herself to boulder well after the injury.
Sally was single.
She went out one night.
She met someone.
He was younger.
They still decided to date.
Ivan was playing an educational computer game.
In the game, his character was born in a third world country.
And he struggled with health problems and crime.
Ivan thought the game was depressing and stopped playing.
But he learned about problems in other parts of the world.
It was raining outside that's why i can't go anywhere.
There is no good movie to watch so i just eat whatever i want.
When i get bored,i decided to bake some cookies.
I was satisfied with the taste that's why i baked more.
I gave few to our neighbor and the rest i gave it to my friends.
Nina had not expected caring for twins to be so exhausting.
The two boys seemed to have a conspiracy against her getting to sleep.
They would take turns sleeping in shifts all night.
Nina finally got them both to sleep right before the alarm bell rang.
She threw the noisy alarm at the wall, breaking it as she passed out.
Linda got two ticket for a Packers game.
She invited her friend to go with her.
They had a great time.
Then they found out their valets were stolen.
They called police.
Ken had a crush on a girl.
His friends pressured him into telling her.
Ken walked up to her with the intention to do so.
At the last minuted he lost his nerve.
He kept walking past her.
We had a school camping when i was in grade school.
It was really fun and adventurous.
We made bonfire on our first night.
I thought it was difficult to make bonfire but i was wrong.
It was the time that i learned how to make bonfire.
Tim was walking to school.
He accidentally dropped him lunch money.
He didn't even noticed.
Sue saw the money.
Tim was relieved when she gave him his lunch money.

5b8d54f3-be72-428b-83a9-24a226dc1fa1.storytitle: A Lesson Paid for in Sweat
story: A man went out early one morning.
It was freezing cold, so he wore his winter coat.
By midmorning, he was uncomfortably hot.
By noon, he found himself sweating uncontrollably.
He resolved, next time, to check the day's overall forecast.
The guy needed cash.
He took his most valuable possessions to the pawn shop.
They gave him a hundred dollars for everything.
The guy was disappointed in himself.
He swore he would be better with his money in the future.
Fred wanted to ask Lucy out on a date.
He was thinking about her all year.
Unfortunately however, he was nervous.
When he saw Lucy he finally got the courage to ask her.
Luckily she said yes.
There was a small town in Somerset with a strange boy.
This strange boy was called Bobby.
He was known as the strange boy because of his eating habits.
Bobby was locally famous for eating foam cushions.
Despite help from experts, he still consumes a cushion every month.
Pat and Sherri have been married for 20 years.
They have lived all of their lives in Michigan and have never left.
So they planned a trip to Hawaii and saved money for 3 years.
When they had enough money they went on their trip to Hawaii.
Pat and Sherri really enjoyed Hawaii and said it was a dream vacation.
Kathy was running a marathon.
She was toward the middle of the group.
She had never finished a marathon before.
She was within a mile of the finish line.
Kathy persevered and finished the marathon before passing out.
Martin had been out of work for a long time.
His friends tried to support him but it was becoming a burden.
Martin did some research and found about mechanical turk.
He worked for days to get proficient at MTurk.
Now Martin is self sufficient and even paid back his friends!
I went to the store to buy a new mouse pad.
I bought one for 50 dollars.
When I took it home, it broke instantly.
I took it back to the store to get my money back.
The manager was so embarrassed that I got double my money back.
Tim had his birthday at the bowling alley.
Him and his friends all played games.
Tim won most of them.
His friends let him win since it was his birthday.
It made Tim feel happy.
John got nervous easily.
He had a job interview tomorrow.
He asked his friend for help.
His friend suggested a breathing technique.
John applied it during the interview and got the job.
Ian didn't pay attention in class.
He daydreamed while the teacher was talking.
Ian would fall asleep during the class time.
Ian's schoolwork began to suffer.
He had to repeat his grade.
Mia was tired of being woken up by her neighbor's loud music.
She confronted him one day, but her effort was in vain.
The next time, she took a new approach and called the police.
The police arrived and ticketed him for causing a nuisance.
Mia's tactic worked and she was never woken up by him again.
Jim was running late for class.
He had missed his bus.
His mom had to drive him to school.
He arrived to class 20 minutes late.
His teacher gave him detention.
Tom married the love of his life.
Jen, Tom's wife, loved him very much.
Everyone said Tom and Jen had the perfect life.
The problem was Jen talked during football games.
Tom filed for a divorce.
Lindsay decided she needed to make a life change and lose weight.
She read up on healthy ways to do it.
For 9 months Lindsay ate better and exercised more.
She ended up losing 65 pounds overall by the end of the year.
Lindsay is much healthier and can now run races again.
Franklin went to the store to buy some condoms.
He couldn't find any in his size.
He decided not to use any.
A few months later he got a call.
His ex-girlfriend told him she was pregnant.
Gabe loved to glide around Brazil.
He build tons of custom gliders in his garage.
He decided to make a business out of his hobby.
He opened a shack on a cliff selling gliders.
Gabe hasn't had much success unfortunately.
There was a riot in the street
People were breaking stuff and stealing
The cops came into the picture
They started tazing people
the riot stopped
Jodie's baby had an accident.
She spilled grape juice on the floor.
Jodie called around for cleaners.
She finally found one.
They did a really good job!
John, Eric and Carl waited in line for four hours.
They wanted to see the premier of the new Star Wars movie.
They rushed in the theater to get good seats.
After they were settled, Eric went and got popcorn.
They agreed afterwards it was well worth the wait.
Sam had a sweet old pit bull who never hurt anyone.
The dog had been with Sam since he was a baby, and was very old.
One of Sam's neighbors raised a fuss and called animal control anyway.
Sam organized a protest and put his dog all over social media.
The dog was reunited with Sam and they were so thankful.
I went to use my Touch ID on my phone.
It was broken.
I had to get it fixed.
But when I brought it to someone, they said it couldn't be fixed.
So I had to buy another one instead.
Susie's boyfriend wanted to give her a special gift.
He bought her an exotic plant and had it delivered to her house.
When he called her to make plans for the weekend, she was sick.
She had received the plant but was allergic to it.
Her boyfriend came to pick the plant right away so she could heal.
David was listening to music when he adjusted his headphones.
He heard a loud sound and then they fell apart.
He attempted to fix them, but they wouldn't work.
That night, David's dad saw them and started to fix them.
The next morning David woke up to find his headphones fixed!
Tim was eating tacos with salsa.
A friend wanted to try them.
Tim told him they were too spicy.
The friend took a bite anyway.
Within seconds the friend was crying and chugging water.
On the first day of school, I saw the cutest guy.
He was new at our school.
I gave him my number.
He called me later that night.
I now have a date this weekend.
Jane had put up her house on the market just last week.
She patiently waited for the open house to be over.
Finally, the last few couples left her house and she was tired.
She felt a range of emotions and talked to the realtor.
She told him that she decided to keep her house.
Mike was a high school kid who seemed to love trouble.
Mike convinced his buddies to go out with him late one night.
Mike lit some cherry bomb firecrackers and put them in a mailbox.
The box blew apart, and everyone scattered into the night.
Mike, however, was caught by a neighbor, and got in big trouble.
It was Sunday.
So John and his family were going to church.
But John knew he would be bored.
So John bought his phone.
And he played games on it while at church.
Sean was at baseball practice.
While there, he was hit in the head with the ball.
He thought he was okay at first.
However, he got dizzy.
Sean was then diagnosed with a concussion.
Bob bought a new trombone from a yard sale.
He took it home and tooted on it constantly.
Bob's parents suggested he join the school band.
He was very quickly told by the band leader he couldn't join.
Bob learned that sometimes tooting alone wasn't good enough.
Joe needed a new desk.
His had a broken leg.
He went to the office store to find one.
It took him hours to find one he liked.
He finally bought a new desk.
Kayla and Dawn were going to the cupcake shop.
They both pledged to start diets in the morning.
Both agreed a treat was in order for their decisions.
They both loved the cupcakes.
Instead of going on a diet they ate cupcakes everyday.
Tom was given a new puzzle.
He could not figure out how to solve it.
He pulled it and shook it, but there was no change.
With no solution in sight he threw the puzzle.
The impact unsatisfactorily solved the puzzle for Tom.
Millie was expecting all of her gifts to arrive by Christmas.
But, when she checked the tracking she saw that they were too far.
She was really disappointed and didn't know what to do.
Finally, she decided to just enjoy the gifts that had arrived.
When the late gifts did arrive, she enjoyed them just as much.
I had just been accepted to a new job.
The job required travel.
But, I didn't want to use my own car.
I told my boss that I would like a company car.
She gave me a Jaguar!
Joe grew up on an animal farm.
There was a particular chick to which Joe felt attached.
Joe watched the chick hatch and held it as a newborn.
One evening Joe had a wonderful chicken dinner made by his mom.
Joe was horrified to learn he had just eaten that once beloved chick!
Dan went to a family party with his mom.
His cousin offered him a drink when they arrived.
Although Dan's mom prohibits from drinking, he tried to drink.
However, he had to hide from his mom throughout the whole party.
Eventually his mom found out and yelled at him.
